Articles.Content: I've been doing Minmus and Mun runs for science. I've got a Scientist on board, level 2. When returning the experiments back to Kerbin I am not getting a bonus to the science I generated, for instance, a 100 science materials study gets returned for just 100, not 110. What's going on?
I dont realy know, but I think that the scientist bonus is only on the transmitting of science data.
